tag_list: noisetrend, felipegomez, luis, gomez, felipe, noisetrend-com, music
overview:
Felipe is the Founder of the new music website, noisetrend. At the age of 15, he began to penetrate the music industry by opening a small music blog by the name of 12fruits.

At age 16, he moved onto booking a tour for his music blog which eventually led to a new name change and a new structure for the mission he was set out to do, Give music artists a stage to play and an audience.

Felipe then created noisetrend.com to help artists promote themselves and give them a decent online audience. He has booked his second New England tour with five music artists, and is expected to release annual Compilation CD’s under the new website, All projects that have brought a steady income.

Currently residing in Greenwich, CT he is the leader of a strong team of music lovers who help bring people what noisetrend is today, a new music social network where its members “bring the crowd”.

Though his work may seem small, at his age he is set to become successful in the Music and Online networking industry.

On the side of his music projects he is also a freelance designer, working for companies like Project (215), Focus Records, and many more. He has designed for music artists such as Pillar (SONY/FLICKR Records), Nevertheless (SONY/FLICKR Records), Another Option (All About Records / Focus Records), Unspoken (SONY/Provident Records) and the list goes on.

He worked on yazzem.com as lead designer for 1 1/2 years along with TeensInTech Inc. He is currently working as lead designer for Project (215), Noterly, and Focus Records.

A website is not a website without a proper design. Felipe has been given the eye for design and the talent to mix colors and create professionally designed websites.

milestones.description: This was the new england tour he booked and promoted for his music social network.
